response.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!--
  THIS FILE NEEDS TO BE EMBEDDED INTO `RequirementsFileXml.json` IN ORDER TO BE RECOGNIZED BY THE TESTS.
  IT WILL **NOT** BE SOURCED ON ITS OWN
  IT IS ONLY STORED HERE FOR EDITING AND READABILITY PURPOSES

  USE THE FOLLOWING COMMAND TO CREATE THE NEEDED STRING:
  cat RequirementsXmlFile.xml|sed -e 's@"@\"@g'|sed -e ':a' -e 'N' -e '$!ba' -e 's@
@\n@g'
-->
<requirements xmlns="http://weblabel.hella-aglaia.com/schema/requirements">
  <thing id="thing-one" shape="rectangle" name="Thing One">
    <class id="class-a" name="Class A">
      <value id="value-a" name="Value A">
        <class ref="class-priv-a" />
      </value>
      <value id="value-b" name="Value B">
        <class id="class-b" name="Class B">
          <value id="value-c" name="Value C">
            <class id="class-c" name="Class C">
              <value id="value-d" name="Value D" />
              <value id="value-e" name="Value E">
                <class ref="lamp-color" />
              </value>
            </class>
          </value>
          <value id="value-f" name="Value F">
            <class ref="class-e" />
          </value>
        </class>
        <class id="class-d" name="Class D">
          <value id="value-g" name="Value G" />
          <value id="value-h" name="Value H" />
          <value id="value-i" name="Value I">
            <class id="class-e" name="Class E">
              <value id="value-j" name="Value J" />
              <value id="value-k" name="Value K" />
            </class>
          </value>
        </class>
        <class ref="lamp-color" />
      </value>
    </class>
  </thing>

  <thing id="thing-two" shape="rectangle" name="Thing Two">
    <class id="time=" name="Time">
      <value id="day" name="Day" />
      <value id="night" name="Night">
        <class id="class-" name="Class ">>
          <value id="neon" name="Neon lights">
            <class name="Lamp Color" id="lamp-color">
              <value id="white" name="White" />
              <value id="orange" name="Orange" />
            </class>
          </value>
          <value id="halogen" name="Halogen lights" />
          <value id="xenon" name="Xenon lights" />
        </class>
      </value>
    </class>
  </thing>

  <private>
    <class id="class-priv-a" name="Class Private A">
      <value id="value-priv-a" name="Value Private A" />
      <value id="value-priv-b" name="Value Private B" />
      <value id="value-priv-c" name="Value Private C" />
    </class>
  </private>
</requirements>
